site_name: Hurlingham Club Ranelagh GardensLondonSW6 3PR
borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T1) Plane, reduce crown by -  Specified extent RoH <1/1 000 000 height and lateral  branch length by approximately 2-3m to relieve wind loading and minimise risk of branch failure and establish smaller crown; remove dead wood. T2) Plane, reduce crown by -  Specified extent RoH <1/1 000 000 height and lateral  branch length by approximately 3m to relieve wind loading and minimise risk of branch failure and establish smaller crown; remove dead wood. T4) Horse Chestnut, reduce lateral limb limbs by approximately 1-2m to suitable growth points to minimise risk of branch failure and encourage establishment of a smaller crown. T10) Holm Oak, reduce lateral limb / limbs extended branches to east, south and west by approximately 2m to minimise risk of failure. Please see attached arb report.
